root: ^!Thunder cracks and a door bursts open. Appearing from the shadows I see…
^!It’s… Jade. She looks completely different. No shawl, no Victorian-era clothing, no makeup.
^%I wasn’t planning to share this side of me until much later, but… I’m not as Goth as you think.
^%I uh… I’m a systems administrator for the IT department of a realty company.
^%I wear tennis shoes to work and I listen to Bruce Springsteen. I enjoy going to the hardware store and looking at storage solutions. And I… volunteer at an animal shelter in my spare time.
^%I’m fascinated with Victorian history and the Goth lifestyle, that much is true. It’s just… not all that I am. And I need you to know that.
^%I, um… completely understand if you… aren’t interested. In me. Anymore.
^¥I’m not a cool Goth princess. I’m boring! I own five pairs of tennis shoes! I put my hair up! Don’t you care?
^%Jade, do you really think I only like you because of all the goth stuff? That’s all cool. But the best thing about you is how passionate you are about the things you love.
^%History, art, Victorian fashion, animals, storage solutions…  it doesn’t matter what it is. You care. And that’s awesome.
^%You don’t think I’m… boring? At all?
^%If you’re boring, then I don’t know what that makes me.
^%I spend too much time online shopping for vacuums. I get excited to mow my lawn on Saturdays. I get cranky about commercials being too loud. I’ve been thinking about making my own peanut butter.
^%Then maybe… we can be boring together.
^%It would never be boring if it was with you.
^!Jade suddenly closes the gap between us and pulls me into a hug. She buries her face in my shoulder. Her hair smells like lavender and rosemary.
^&I was scared you wouldn’t like me.
^!Jade pulls away for a second and looks me in the eyes. Her eyes are so dark and soulful.
^%Verily, you may take upon yourself the…
^!She smiles slightly and leans in, giving me a gentle kiss.
^!Jade pulls away and gives me an intense look.
